Channell.mycollectiondescst: Channels in spurtCMS let you organize different content types, e.g., Blogs, News, Jobs, or Product Listings. Each channel contains entries—individual pieces like articles, job descriptions, or product listings.
Channell.mycollectiondescmidnext: for proper display based on their type. Each entry can also be grouped into

Mediaa.azurecont: Manage your files with Azure Storage, a reliable and scalable cloud storage solution by Microsoft. Easily access and organize your media files in a secure environment.

Datas.datadesc: You may import and export data as and when needed.
Datas.dataimportdesc: Effortlessly import your website content into spurtCMS.Upload Excel sheets in any format, accommodating all your existing content details that may differ from spurtCMS standards.
Datas.importimgdesc: Import images in bulk while making sure that the file name with extension of the image is same as the name with extension entered in the excel sheet.
Datas.choseimg: Choose image zip file from directory
Datas.fieldmapdesc: After import, your existing fields appear in the UI. Utilize dropdowns for easy mapping of your differing fields to spurtCMS fields. Achieve accurate data syncing effortlessly.
Datas.datamigdesc: Confirm error-free mapping and then kickstart the migration for your content to seamlessly flow into the spurtCMS Channels.
Datas.successmsg: The migration has been completed successfully!
Datas.exportdesc: Select a Channel from the dropdown and export all the related data pertaining to the Channel.

Ecommerce.storeinfo: Enter the name of your store. This will be displayed to customers and used for brand identification.
Ecommerce.currencyinfo: Select the primary currency used for transactions in your store. Choose the currency that aligns with your target market and business operations. Toggle the Status button to enable a particular currency.
Ecommerce.paymentinfo: Admins can enable or disable specific payment gateways, choosing which methods to offer during checkout. Access permissions dictate which admins can manage gateways based on their assigned levels.
Ecommerce.statusinfo: Admins control the enabling or disabling of order statuses, tailoring active statuses to their workflow. Permissions determine which admins can manage order statuses according to their assigned access levels.
Ecommerce.displaystock: Enable this option to show the current stock levels to customers on the product page. Disable if you prefer to keep stock levels hidden.
Ecommerce.warning: Enable this option to display a warning message when a product is out of stock. Disable if you do not want to alert customers when items are unavailable.
Ecommerce.checkout: Enable this option to allow customers to purchase items that are currently out of stock. Disable to prevent customers from buying out-of-stock products.

Templates.templatesheading: Pre-built layouts for various content types.
Templates.title: Next.js Templates
Templates.bannerheading: For Elegant Design and Perfect Structure
Templates.mycollectiondescst: Templates in spurtCMS define how content from
Templates.mycollectiondescmid: like Blogs, Jobs, or Product Listings, news report, etc,  is displayed. Each entry, such as articles or job descriptions or product descriptions, or press releases is linked to a specific template for clear, professional and appropriate presentation. Switch templates effortlessly from channel to channel, for
Templates.mycollectiondescend: within to match your content’s style and purpose, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Templates.helpcenterdes: Organize Help Guides and FAQs for seamless user support.
Templates.jobsdes: Display job listings and applications with clarity and detail.
Templates.blogdes: Choose to present your blog articles in unique styles for engaging storytelling.
Templates.newsdes: Stay ahead with breaking news and top stories.

Blocks.mycollection: Bring your Content to Perfect Shapes
Blocks.mycollectiondescst: Blocks in spurtCMS provide a flexible way to organize and structure your scattered content into visually appealing layouts. Use Blocks to design and display content within your
Blocks.mycollectiondescend: —whether it’s blogs, product descriptions, or knowledge articles and more. Create new Blocks or utilize existing ones, ensuring every piece of content is showcased effectively and consistently across your platform.
Blocks.notedesc: Add a preview image to represent how your block will appear on the website. This helps in visualizing the block's design and layout.
Blocks.tagerr: Please press enter key to add tags
Blocks.delcontent: Are you sure you want delete this block ?
Blocks.noblock: Build stunning layouts and structure your content creatively with custom blocks.
Blocks.titlelable: Enter a descriptive title for your block to identify its purpose.
Blocks.blockhtmllable: Add the HTML structure for your block. Note: Use Tailwind CSS for styling.
Blocks.selectchannellable: Choose the channel where this block will be used to maintain content consistency.
Blocks.uploadcoverimagelable: Add an image to visually represent this block for better content engagement.

FormBuilder.ctaheading: Add action-driven forms for engaging users or collecting information.
FormBuilder.areyousurewantdelete: Are you Sure you Want to Delete this Form into Website?
FormBuilder.noform: Start building custom forms with free text, dropdowns, checkboxes, and more. Collect the information you need effortlessly!
FormBuilder.nodraft: Save your unfinished forms here to finalize and publish later. Begin creating now to tailor your forms perfectly!
FormBuilder.nounpublished: Move live forms here to make changes and republish them. Keep your forms up-to-date and user-friendly!
FormBuilder.ctadesc: Build CTA Forms that captures what matters for your business.
FormBuilder.fbanner: Seamless User Engagement with CTA Forms
FormBuilder.sbanner: CTA Forms in spurtCMS empower you to capture leads, collect responses, and drive interactions effortlessly. Whether it’s a Contact Form, Survey Form, or Sign-up Form, customize fields, set validation rules, and enhance user engagement. Easily integrate forms within your
FormBuilder.fobanner: to streamline data collection and optimize user experience.

Support.title: Support Us by Allowing Us to Serve You Better
Support.supportdec: Choosing our support service means gaining expert guidance for your projects while contributing to the growth of spurtCMS, an open-source initiative built on the modern Golang tech stack. Your support fuels a passionate team of Golang enthusiasts on a mission to enhance spurtCMS, ensuring it remains a cutting-edge, open-source web development solution for everyone.
Support.servicehead: What are the ways in which you can seek tech support service from us?
Support.servicelist1: Host and Optimize spurtCMS Production Instance with our expert guidance for Installation and Deployment on your own servers to gain complete control.
Support.servicelist2: Customize spurtCMS to meet your unique business needs with tailored solutions for enhanced functionality.
Support.servicelist3: Hire our Golang & NextJS Developers for technical expertise on seamless integration of spurtCMS.
Support.servicelist4: Collaborate with us to kick-start and shape your new project idea.
Support.nameplaceholder: Enter your name or company name
Support.decplaceholder: Describe your needs for our precise assistance to you

integrations.title: Take full control of your CMS with SpurtCMS Pro v1.2, deployed directly on your server with premium features and lifetime benefits.
integrations.keypoint1: Everything You See in the Demo – Yours to Keep
integrations.keypoint4: Fully White-Label – Make It Your Own
integrations.cloudtite: SpurtCMS Pro v1.2 Build with Technology
integrations.list1: What do I get with my purchase?
integrations.sublist1: You will receive the full version of SpurtCMS Pro v1.2, exactly as shown in the demo. It includes lifetime upgrades, 30 hours of developer support, white-label branding, and access to all free Next.js templates.
integrations.list2: Is there a one-time payment or a subscription model?
integrations.sublist2: We offer a one-time payment model. Pay once and enjoy lifetime benefits, including future updates and expert consultation.
integrations.list3: Do you offer a free trial or demo?
integrations.sublist3: Yes! You can try our fully functional demo before making a purchase. What you see in the demo is exactly what you'll get.
integrations.list4: Can I get a refund if I’m not satisfied?
integrations.sublist4: Due to the nature of digital products, we do not offer refunds once the product is downloaded. However, we provide a demo version so you can evaluate before purchasing.
integrations.list5: What is included in the 30 hours of developer support?
integrations.sublist5: Our developers will assist you with:
integrations.sublist10: Beyond 30 hours, additional support is available at an hourly rate.
integrations.list6: Can I use SpurtCMS Pro v1.2 for multiple projects?
integrations.sublist11: Your purchase includes a single-use license for one domain/project. For multiple projects, additional licenses are required.
integrations.sublist12: You can fully rebrand SpurtCMS Pro v1.2 by changing the logo, colors, brand name, and other visual elements to match your business identity.
integrations.list8: Can I get custom features developed?
integrations.sublist13: Yes! We offer consultation and customization services. If you need additional features, our development team can build them for you at a custom rate.
integrations.list9: What payment methods do you accept?
integrations.sublist14: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Contact us if you need alternative payment options.
integrations.list10: How do I get started after purchasing?
integrations.sublist15: After completing your purchase, you’ll receive:
integrations.sublist16: A download link for SpurtCMS Pro v1.2
integrations.sublist18: Access to our developer support team to assist with installation

AImodulesettings.googledesc: Leverage Google's AI-powered tools for text analysis, content creation and automation.
AImodulesettings.deepseekdesc: Harness deep learning capabilities for advanced data processing and AI-driven insights.

Coursessettings.desccont: Provide a detailed overview of the course, including key topics and learning outcomes.
Coursessettings.imagedesc: Upload a cover image that represents the course. Choose a high-quality image for better engagement.
Coursessettings.catdesc: Select the appropriate category to classify the course for easy discovery.
Coursessettings.cerdesc: Enable this option if you want to provide a certificate upon course completion.

Coursessettings.waitlistdesc: Learners can register, but access is provided later.
Coursessettings.paiddesc: The course requires a payment to enroll.

Coursessettings.visibilitydesc: Define who can view and enroll in the course.
Coursessettings.datedesc: Set a specific date when the course becomes available.
Coursessettings.singuplimitdesc: Specify a maximum number of students allowed for the course.
Coursessettings.durationdesc: Determine how long the course remains accessible after enrollment.

Menu.bannerdesc: Easily build and customize your website using intuitive controls and flexible templates. The Website tab lets you organize pages, set up navigation, and ensure your content is always up-to-date—helping you deliver a seamless experience for your visitors.
